recipes.title: Asian beef with carrots
recipes.description: A delicious medium recipe featuring beef and carrots.
instructions: Prepare beef by seasoning with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat
Cook beef until golden brown, about 5-7 minutes
Add carrots and cook until tender, 3-5 minutes
Serve over cooked pasta
Enjoy your delicious meal!

recipes.description: A delicious hard recipe featuring fish and onions.

Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat

Add onions and cook until tender, 3-5 minutes
Serve over cooked quinoa
Enjoy your delicious meal!
